CSSNamespaceRule.summary: The CSSNamespaceRule interface describes an object representing a single CSS @namespace at-rule.

CSSNamespaceRulePrefix.summary: The read-only prefix property of the returns a string with the name of the prefix associated to this namespace. If there is no such prefix, it returns an empty string.
CSSNamespaceRulePrefix.value: A string containing the prefix associated to this namespace. If there is no prefix an empty string.

CSSNamespaceRuleNamespaceURI.summary: The read-only namespaceURI property of the returns a string containing the text of the URI of the given namespace.
